metadata.title: CVE-2021-40647 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In man2html 1.6g, a specific string being read in from a file willoverwrite the size parameter in the top chunk of the heap. This at leastcauses the program to segmentation abort if the heap size parameter isn'taligned correctly. In version before GLIBC version 2.29 and alignedcorrectly, it allows arbitrary write anywhere in the programs memory.

criterions.comment: man2html package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
